sentences.sContent: She took it calmly at first but under the surface was seething.
sentences.sCn: 她起初处之泰然，但内心却是气呼呼的。

sentences.sContent: She put a hand on her hip, grinning derisively, while I seethed with rage.
sentences.sCn: 她把一只手叉着腰，嘲弄地咧嘴而笑，而此时我已怒火中烧。

remMethod.val: 看见 (see) 那 (the) 骚动 (seethe) 的场面

trans.tranOther: When you are seething, you are very angry about something but do not express your feelings about it
